title: Long-lost Nigerian masterpiece found in London
text:
Long-lost Nigerian masterpiece found in London   01:41 
A portrait of a Nigerian princess that was lost for more than 40 years has been found in a London flat. It will be sold at an auction screened live in Lagos, allowing Nigerian art lovers to make bids direct from the West African mega-city.
